document.full_text: amazon said on wednesday that it would begin to allow kindle customers to borrow e-books from more than 11,000 libraries across the country. amazon will work with overdrive, a large provider of e-books to public libraries and schools.
document.title: coming to your kindle: library books
lines_and_colors: amazon said on wednesday that it would begin to allow kindle customers to borrow e-books from more than 11,000 libraries across the country. amazon will work with overdrive, a large provider of e-books to public libraries and schools.
